bs-wantedarticle-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of wanted page extension
prefs-wantedarticle:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for wanted page section in preferences.
{{Identical|Wanted page}}
bs-wantedarticle-ajax-error-no-parameter: Text for no page title provided.
bs-wantedarticle-ajax-error-suggested-pa:
Text for the suggested page "$1" already exitis. 
* $1 is the name of the suggested page

Text for the suggested page "$1" is already suggested. 

$1 is the name of the suggested page
bs-wantedarticle-edit-comment-suggestion:
Text for suggestion "$1" added. 

$1 is the name of the suggested page
bs-wantedarticle-success-suggestion-ente: Text for your suggestion "$1" has been added.
bs-wantedarticle-sort-value-unknown: Text for valid values are: title and time.
bs-wantedarticle-page-removed:
Text for the page "$1" has been removed.

$1 is the name of the suggested page
bs-wantedarticle-single-textfield-defaul:
Default text in input field for page title
{{Identical|Page title}}
bs-wantedarticle-tag-wantedarticle-desc:
Text for renders a list of wanted pages. Available configuration attributes:
{{Related|Bs-tag-desc}}
bs-wantedarticle-tag-wantedarticle-desc-: Text for count: Number of pages to display. "count" has to be lowercase
Text for title: Headline. "title" has to be lowercase
Text for sort: Sort by title or time. "sort" has to be lowercase
Text for type: Output format list or quene (comma separated). "type" has to be lowercase
bs-wantedarticle-pref-includelimit: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for number of suggestions:
bs-wantedarticle-pref-deleteexisting: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for delete existing entries
bs-wantedarticle-pref-showcreate: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for show create link
bs-wantedarticle-pref-deleteoncreation: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for remove entry from list when page is created. This preference enables automatic deletion of entries from the list as soon as their page was created.
bs-wantedarticle-pref-datasourcetemplate: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences]: label for template title for suggestions, that is the new pages requested by users via the WantedArticle extension.
bs-wantedarticle-pref-sort:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for sort by:
{{Identical|Sort by}}
bs-wantedarticle-pref-order:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for order:
{{Identical|Order}}
bs-wantedarticle-pref-sort-time:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], option label for time
{{Identical|Time}}
bs-wantedarticle-pref-sort-title:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], option label for title
{{Identical|Title}}
bs-wantedarticle-pref-order-asc:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], option label for ascending
{{Identical|Ascending}}
bs-wantedarticle-pref-order-desc:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], option label for descending
{{Identical|Descending}}
bs-wantedarticle-create-page:
Text for create page "$1". $1 is the entered page name
{{Identical|Create page}}
bs-wantedarticle-suggest-page: Test for suggest page "$1". $1 is the entered page name
bs-wantedarticle-info-nothing-entered: Text for please provide a valid page title.
bs-wantedarticle-title-invalid-chars:
Text for the following characters are not valid for use in a page title: $2.

Parameters:
* $1 - the number of characters which are not valid - use for PLURAL distinction
* $2 - a comma separated list of invalid characters
